NAME

devicesinlan_gui: Scans all devices in your LAN. Then you can set an alias to your known devices in order to detect future strange devices in your net.

SYNOPSIS

devicesinlan_gui [--help] [--version] [--debug DEBUG]

DESCRIPCIÓN

        En el menú de la aplicación tienes las siguientes funcionalidades:

                Dispositivo > Nuevo escaneado

                        Searches all devices in tha LAN and show them in a new tab. If some device is not in the known devices list it will be shown with a red background. Devices with a green background are trusted devices

                Dispositivos > Muestra la base de datos de dispositivos

                        Muestra todo los dispositivos conocidos en una nueva pestaña.

                        Hacer click derecho te permite editar la base de datos de dispositivos conocidos.

                Dispositivos > Carga una lista de dispositivos

                        Carga una lista de dispositivos conocidos en formato xml.

                Devices > Save devices list

                        Saves the known devices list to a xml file.

                Devices > Reset database

                        Removes all known devices.

                        This option erases all known devices in database.

                Configuration > Settings

                        In this dialog you can select your prefered language and you can configure the number of concurrence request.

                Ayuda > Ayuda

                        Muestra esta información de ayuda.

                Help > About

                        Shows information about DevicesInLAN license and authors.

                Help > Check for updates

                        Checks for updates in DevicesInLan repository.

                Ayuda > Salir

                        Exits from program.

Created with libmangenerator at 2018-11-19
